name: Doom Rails
description: Doom Rails is a new casual-style 3D multiplayer cart battle game where you select one of nine characters, and zip around hazardous roller coaster tracks. Blast opponentâ€™s carts to bits using rockets, force fields, pulse waves, and mines. While battling others avoid spiked pendulums, metal fists, and exploding debris.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows ME/XP/VISTA/7Processor: 2GhzMemory: 1 GBGraphics: (Shader 3) NVIDIA 6150 or ATI R520 (Recommended: NVIDIA 9800 or ATI Radeon 4850)DirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 650MBSound: Direct Audio Compatible Device

reviews.review_text: This classic by Naughty Dog has aged so well and still to this date you can feel the emotional bonding between the protagonist 'Doom Rail' and Ellie as they struggle to survive in a post apocalyptic world run by your evil clone 'Doom Rail' hence the title 'Doom Rails'.This intricate plot bridges and intertwines between Naughty Dog's present triple A titles including 'Call of Duty 4' and 'Madden 53' so i suggest you play doom rails first before you can experience their newer titles at a more personal and emotional level of entertainment.   ' Fez II is cancelled, i am done' - Phil Fish 0/5
